trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by a spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 實作微調方塊 (Spin Box，也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 需要的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: A spin box consists of a text box and a small vertical scroll bar, commonly referred to as a spin button control.
trans-unit.target: 微調方塊是由文字方塊和小型的垂直捲軸，通常稱為微調按鈕控制項所組成。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> class links the two controls and allows the user to change the display in the text box by clicking the up or down buttons or by entering the appropriate type of value directly into the text box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>連結兩個控制項類別，並可讓使用者變更顯示在文字方塊中，按一下向上或向下按鈕或直接在文字方塊中輸入適當的值類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the spin box in cases where you want to limit the list of values a user can select, similar to a list box or combo box.
trans-unit.target: 使用微調方塊，在您要限制的值，使用者清單的情況下可以選取，類似於清單方塊或下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: Depending upon the type of list you want to display, the advantage to using a spin box is that it allows you to quickly set a range of valid values, rather than adding items one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 您想要顯示的清單的類型而定，使用微調方塊的優點是它可讓您快速將範圍設定為有效的值，而不是加入一個項目一次。

trans-unit.source: Implementing a spin box requires less data validation than a text box, as you can limit the data type when you derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 實作微調方塊，在衍生的類別時，您可以限制的資料類型，需要較少的資料驗證文字方塊中，比<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: An example of this is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> class, which limits the values to the numeric type and uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A> property to validate the data.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，這是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>類別，這會限制為數值類型的值，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A>屬性來驗證資料。

trans-unit.source: To allow the user to use the arrow keys to change the contents of a spin box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓使用者使用方向鍵來變更微調方塊的內容，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: To restrict the user to values you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要限制使用者所指定的值，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: To control the alignment of text in the spin box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制微調方塊中的文字的對齊方式，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set the alignment of the up and down buttons in relation to the text box portion of the control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A> property to either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment.Right>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的向上和向下按鈕相對於控制項的文字方塊部分的對齊方式，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>屬性設為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment.Left>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment.Right>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A> methods, when overridden, handle the clicking of the up or down buttons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A>方法，覆寫時，會處理按一下向上或向下按鈕。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> methods validate the value (either selected or entered) and update the text displayed in the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>方法驗證的值 （無論是選取或輸入），並更新微調方塊中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the value fails validation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A> method to select the text that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果值無法通過驗證，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>方法來選取不是有效的文字。

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to quickly correct the text by simply typing in a new value without having to manually select or delete the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者快速修正的文字，只要輸入新值，而不需要以手動方式選取或刪除現有的文字。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/includes/net-2015-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/includes/net-2015-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整控制項的大小：

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and sets some of its properties derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和設定的某些屬性衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control named `numericUpDown1`, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項，名為`numericUpDown1`、 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項名為`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項名為`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在表單上建立。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText" />, and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" />，您必須覆寫下列成員： <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton" />， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton" />， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText" />，和<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the container will allow the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出容器 (Container) 是否允許使用者捲動至任何放置在可視界限以外的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>控制項不會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoScroll%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自動捲動邊界的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示自動捲動邊界的高度和寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>控制項不會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoScrollMargin%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自動捲動區域大小的最小值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the minimum height and width, in pixels, of the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示捲軸的最小高度和寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>控制項不會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should automatically resize based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應根據其內容自動調整大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the control should automatically resize based on its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示應根據控制項的內容自動調整控制項的大小，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSize" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `UpDownBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`UpDownBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the text box portion of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的文字方塊部分的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the text box portion of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示調整方塊的文字方塊部分的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> 的背景影像。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> 的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage%2A>屬性沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>控制; 因此，它隱藏在設計工具，以及從 IntelliSense。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>控制; 因此，它隱藏在設計工具，以及從 IntelliSense。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A> property to create borderless and flat controls in addition to the default three-dimensional control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>建立無框線和一般的屬性會控制除了預設三維控制。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control named `numericUpDown1`, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form.

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text property is being changed internally by its parent class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出文字屬性是否被它的父類別從內部變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" /> property is being changed internally by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" /> 屬性是由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> 類別從內部變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ChangingText%2A> property acts as a flag for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ChangingText%2A>屬性做為旗標<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by derived classes to indicate when the class is changing the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property internally.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可由衍生類別來表示此類別當變更目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性在內部。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the control requires that the user is changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property and will set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，控制項需要使用者正在變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性將設定和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 相關聯的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.target: 與調整方塊相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to associate a shortcut menu with a tree node is with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 與樹狀節點的捷徑功能表的慣用的方法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu appears when the user right-clicks the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下微調方塊，則會出現快顯功能表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: The creation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 建立參數。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dock padding settings for all edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase" /> 控制項所有邊緣的停駐填補設定。

trans-unit.source: The dock paddings settings for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項的停駐填補設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DockPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>控制項不會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DockPadding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, handles the clicking of the down button on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會處理微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的向下按鈕的按下動作。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的，務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得指示控制項是否擁有輸入焦點的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦點在控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 調整方塊的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ForeColor%2A> property will change the color of the text in the textbox portion of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ForeColor%2A>屬性會變更微調方塊的文字方塊部分中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否能用向上鍵和向下鍵來選取值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control allows the use of the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者能用向上鍵和向下鍵來選取值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A> property is set to `true` and the spin box (also known as an up-down control) has focus, the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>屬性設定為`true`微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 具有焦點，使用者可以使用向上和向下鍵來選取值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and sets some of its properties derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和設定的某些屬性衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control named `numericUpDown1`, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項，名為`numericUpDown1`、 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項名為`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項名為`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在表單上建立。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, which is the maximum size of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，是調整方塊的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the specified value, the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the maximum size will always be 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值，不論<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>的大小上限會一直保持 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, which is the minimum size of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，是調整方塊的最小大小。

trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果使用者按向下鍵，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 微調方塊的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property of the text box portion of the control and is adjusted for the style of border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.PreferredHeight%2A>屬性值根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A>控制項的文字方塊部分的屬性，且會進行調整框線的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and sets some of its properties derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和設定的某些屬性衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項，以及三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項在表單上建立。

trans-unit.source: Label the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BorderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Label the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to the combo box labeled BorderStyle: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入至標記為框線樣式的下拉式方塊： `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to the combo box labeled TextAlign: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入至下拉式方塊標示為 TextAlign: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text can be changed by the use of the up or down buttons only.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出文字是否只能使用向上或向下按鈕變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text can be changed by the use of the up or down buttons only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字只能用向上或向下按鈕變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`, you will eliminate the need for much validation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性`true`，您將不需要太多驗證<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The user will be restricted to the use of the up and down buttons to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 使用者將會限制只能使用向上和向下按鈕變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: It will only allow them to select values you specify.
trans-unit.target: 它將只允許它們選取所指定的值。

trans-unit.source: In the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>, the behavior described is slightly different.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>，描述的行為會有些許不同。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A> is set to `true` and a key is pressed, the control selects the first item in the collection where the first character matches the key pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>設`true`並按下按鍵，控制項就會選取第一個項目集合，其中的第一個字元必須符合已按下的索引鍵中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and sets some of its properties derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和設定的某些屬性衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項，以及三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項在表單上建立。

trans-unit.target: 標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BorderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Label the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 標籤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to the combo box labeled BorderStyle: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入至標記為框線樣式的下拉式方塊： `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入至下拉式方塊標示為 TextAlign: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value prior to the change.
trans-unit.target: 變更之前的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value after the change.
trans-unit.target: 變更之後的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: Provides constants for rescaling the control when a DPI change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 提供在發生 DPI 變更時用來重新調整控制項的常數。

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 要選取的第一個字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: The total number of characters to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 要選取的字元總數。

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) specifying the starting position and number of characters to select.
trans-unit.target: 指定要選取的開始位置和字元數目，以在微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中選取文字的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A> method can be used when the spin box gets focus, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property fails data validation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>方法可以用微調方塊取得焦點，或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性的資料驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: When adding the validation code for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> method in a derived class, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A> method when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 加入驗證程式碼時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>方法在衍生類別中，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>驗證失敗時的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a form and the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace has been added as a reference.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>在表單上建立和<xref:System.Drawing>做為參考已加入命名空間。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for the button, the point size of text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control increases.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件、 文字中的點數大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制會增加。

trans-unit.source: This prompts the control to adjust its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property so that all the text is visible in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這會調整控制項的提示其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.PreferredHeight%2A>屬性，以便顯示在控制項中的所有文字。

trans-unit.source: After the user enters a new value and leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control, the text is converted to a numeric value from a string value and validated to be between the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入新值並離開之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項文字是從字串值轉換成數值和驗證，以介於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is not valid, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> is displayed with the error, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A> method will select the text so the user can enter a new value.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不是有效的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>顯示發生錯誤，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>方法將選取的文字，讓使用者可以輸入新值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The string value displayed in the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 微調方塊中所顯示的字串值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> method is called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property is set while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>呼叫方法時若<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性設定而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> method is called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property is set while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>呼叫方法時若<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性設定而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a form and the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace has been added as a reference.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>在表單上建立和<xref:System.Drawing>做為參考已加入命名空間。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for the button, the point size of text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control increases.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件、 文字中的點數大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制會增加。

trans-unit.source: This prompts the control to adjust its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property so all the text is visible in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這會調整控制項的提示其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.PreferredHeight%2A>讓所有文字都都顯示在控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: After the user enters a new value and leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control, the text is converted to a numeric value from a string value and validated to be between the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入新值並離開之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項文字是從字串值轉換成數值和驗證，以介於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is not valid, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> is displayed with the error, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A> method will select the text so the user can enter a new value.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不是有效的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>顯示發生錯誤，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>方法將選取的文字，讓使用者可以輸入新值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中的文字對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and sets some of its properties derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和設定的某些屬性衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control named `numericUpDown1`, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項，名為`numericUpDown1`、 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項名為`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項名為`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在表單上建立。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, handles the clicking of the up button on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會處理微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的向上按鈕的按下動作。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的，務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText" />方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, updates the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會更新微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to update the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" /> property of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的，請務必更新<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" />微調方塊的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the up and down buttons on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的向上和向下按鈕的對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment.Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and sets some of its properties derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和設定的某些屬性衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control named `numericUpDown1`, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控制項，名為`numericUpDown1`、 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項名為`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項名為`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在表單上建立。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`.
trans-unit.target: 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。

trans-unit.source: The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a value has been entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否已經輸入值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user has changed the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" /> property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已經變更 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property is set while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性設定而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property is set while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>屬性設定而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會驗證微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of validation include comparing the text entered to the data type set in your derived class, comparing the text to a list of values, or verifying the text to be within a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 驗證的範例包括比較輸入資料型別在衍生類別中，設定比較的文字值的清單，或驗證文字的值範圍內的文字。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to add code in this method to validate the text of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的，請務必將程式碼加入此方法以驗證微調方塊的文字。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit" /> property is set to <see langword="false" /> when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果，則會呼叫這個方法<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit" />屬性設定為<see langword="false" />時<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text" />屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: for calling to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於 unmanaged 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 相關的列舉： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
